xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/841388-Colombian DrugPlane 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/9nz8n8XqozcWdXf4Qfw6p3egRJV.jpg Terror reaches new heights when a gang of terrorists steals radioactive material from a nuclear power plant. Although they manage to escape by plane, the pilot is critically injured and they are forced to make an emergency landing. Presenting themselves as a commercial flight, they are granted access to a small private airport. Once on earth, the terrorists kidnap the owner, his daughter and the rest of the staff, forcing them to repair the plane and pilot it to finish the mission. Colombian DrugPlane
